formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Guidance Regarding Ethan’s Recent Absences

Dear Dr. Jane [Last Name],

I hope you’re well. I’m writing to gather any information you can share that will help us support Ethan as he returns to Greenwood Elementary after his recent absences.

Whenever you have a moment, could you please let me know:

• The underlying reason for Ethan’s missed days (as much as you feel comfortable disclosing for school-based planning).  
• Any temporary or long-term accommodations you recommend (e.g., activity restrictions, modified schedule, seating, medication administration, rest breaks).  
• Warning signs we should watch for that would indicate he’s having difficulty or needs additional care at school.  
• Your expectations for follow-up appointments or future absences, so we can plan ahead.  

If it’s helpful, feel free to reference Ethan’s chart or the care-plan notes you keep in Notion/G-Suite, and you may send any relevant documents or doctor’s notes via email when convenient.

Thank you very much for your time and partnership in keeping Ethan healthy and successful at school. Please let me know if there’s anything further you need from us.

Warm regards,

Mrs. Sarah Thompson, RN  
School Nurse | Greenwood Elementary School  
mrs.thompson@greenwoodelementary.edu | 555-123-4567
